title: Trying the Korean root perm seen on tiktok on super flat hair

media:group.media:title: Trying the Korean root perm seen on tiktok on super flat hair
media:group.media:description:
No more flat hair! BuzzFeed producer Vicky (@miss_qi_vous) and her sister Vivienne (@weivienne) take you behind the scene of how Korean root perms are done by hairstylist Nicole (@nicole_hairnyc) at Harueh (@haruehnyc) in NYC.
